website_summaries.verdict: This capable cooker returned consistently great results, but the so-so Bluetooth and app portion isn't quite worth the inflated price.
pros: The Instant Pot Smart cooks food fast with little fuss
cons: Its Bluetooth and app smarts don't add enough value to explain the $299 price tag
Quantity isn't factored into the cooking time guidelines, so you'll have to experiment a lot on your own

customer_reviews.title: The Smart has all the same features as the Duo
customer_reviews.text: To those who ask, "what's the difference between this and the Duo, is it worth it?" YES! The Smart has all the same features as the Duo, but when using the app you can create truly custom recipes. You can set temperature (sous vide, anyone?), time, have it go up and down (check out that sweet bone broth!) and really, so, so much more. I am so happy I got this.
customer_reviews.author: LoRoK

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I. Love. This. Pot. It is a game changer. I always found myself thinking I would like to make a crock pot meal halfway through the day when it was too late for it to be finished in time for dinner. Not any more. I can make anything in this that I can make in a crockpot and its done and ready in 90 minutes or less! I do wish it was slightly bigger. I like to cook large amounts so I can freeze some. But really, with as fast as this cooks, you can still cook two batches of whatever in less time than it would take to make one in the crock pot.

product_meta.title: Instant Pot Smart Bluetooth 6 Qt 7-in-1 Multi-Use Programmable Pressure Cooker, Slow Cooker, Rice Cooker, Yogurt Maker, Sauté, Steamer, and Warmer (Product Discontinued)
product_meta.description: Style Name:Instant Pot Smart Bluetooth (Discontinued)Instant Pot Smart 7-in-1 Multi-Use Programmable Cooker is a revolutionary Smart kitchen appliance designed with the objective of being convenient, dependable and safe. Bluetooth allows you to program and monitor the progress from your smart devices. A free app not only provides recipes, it allows you to program cooking steps in recipe scripts on your devices to execute and share. It speeds up cooking by up to 2-6 times using 70% less energy while producing nutritious, healthy and tasty dishes with consistent results. It replaces 7 common kitchen appliances - pressure cooker, slow cooker, rice/porridge cooker, yogurt maker, sauté/searing, steamer, and warmer; and, built with 14 Smart Programs - Soup, Meat/Stew, Bean/Chili, Poultry, Sauté, Steam, Rice, Porridge, Multigrain, Yogurt, Slow Cook, Keep Warm, and Pressure Cook – Your favorite recipes are as easy as pressing a button. Dual pressure settings for fast and flexible cooking, 3 temperatures for Sauté and Slow Cook, a 24-hour “Delay Start” for delay cooking, and, “Automatic Keep Warm” hold the temperature of the food until you serve. The cooker generates almost no noise and leaks no steam; aromas are trapped in the food without heating up the kitchen. The 3-ply stainless steel inner pot bottom is extremely durable and leaves no health concerns associated with non-stick coatings. Developed with the latest 3rd generation technology with an embedded microprocessor which monitors, the pressure, temperature, keeps time and adjusts heating intensity. These greatly improve cooking results and maintain consistence. Instant Pot is carefully designed to eliminate many common errors that may cause harm or spoil food. It passed stringent UL certification providing you uncompromised safety and peace of mind; protect you with 10 safety mechanisms and patented technologies.
